channel.title: Porn on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Porn on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: tivo oh my tivo.
item.description: soemthing happened that made me think.. “blog this!” but I don’t remember what it was. bummer. maybe I will remember. i got the tivo working. it is pretty fun. I have yet to get the wireless inet working for it. stupid /dev/wlan isn’t there. I don’t understand why. the driver just doesn’t do it. damned USB. I thought about going and buying a shittier one today at compusa. maybe I will do that during lunch.
